issue.subject: An hidden relation with a default value doesn't keep the value
issue.description:
I want to hide hierarchy level field in the metadata form but I want to fix a default value (dataset).

If I set the relation to "hidden", dataset value is not stored in the metadata. Empty value is set.

journals.notes:
Hi Thomas !

Have you updated your 4.3.x branch recently? Because this should have been fixed here : #1085 (except for multi-select here #1090)
No it doesn't work for list with a stereotype textchoice even if there is a single default value

You are right.
I there is no node, it is correctly set, but if there's an empty node, the value is not set.
